statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_finance_data;
SELECT candidate_name, funds_raised FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT candidate_name, expenditure FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE funds_raised > 50000;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE expenditure < 10000;
SELECT candidate_name, contribution_limit FROM campaign_finance_data ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic' ORDER BY expenditure DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, SUM(funds_raised) AS total_funds FROM campaign_finance_data GROUP BY candidate_name, party_affiliation;
SELECT * FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE funds_raised > 5000 AND expenditure < 3000 ORDER BY candidate_name;
SELECT candidate_name, funds_raised, expenditure, ABS(funds_raised - expenditure) AS difference FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE funds_raised > expenditure;
SELECT candidate_name, contribution_limit, ROUND(funds_raised * 0.1) AS 10_percent_funds FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE funds_raised > contribution_limit ORDER BY 10_percent_funds DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT donation_amount, candidate_name FROM campaign_finance_data ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT id, candidate_name, donation_date FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT MAX(donation_amount), MIN(donation_amount) FROM campaign_finance_data;
SELECT contributor_name, total_donations FROM campaign_contributors WHERE last_donation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT candidate_name, donation_amount FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE donation_amount > 5000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC
SELECT contributor_name, total_donations FROM campaign_contributors WHERE total_donations BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000 ORDER BY total_donations ASC
SELECT candidate_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY donation_date ASC, donation_amount DESC
SELECT SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations, candidate_name FROM campaign_finance_data GROUP BY candidate_name HAVING total_donations > 10000 ORDER BY total_donations DESC
SELECT * FROM politician_records;
SELECT politician_name, political_party FROM politician_records WHERE election_year = 2022;
SELECT politician_name, election_year FROM politician_records ORDER BY election_year DESC;
SELECT donation_amount, donor_name FROM campaign_contributions WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT expenditure_date, recipient_name FROM campaign_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount < 5000 ORDER BY expenditure_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM campaign_contributions WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM campaign_contributions WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT politician_name, political_party FROM politician_records WHERE election_year = 2020 ORDER BY politician_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_expenditures WHERE expenditure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Campaign;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM Campaign;
SELECT donor_name, donor_contact FROM Donor WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Contribution WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Contribution GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM Campaign ORDER BY campaign_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM Campaign WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT donor_name, donor_address, amount FROM Donor JOIN Contribution ON Donor.donor_id = Contribution.donor_id WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT e.purpose, e.amount, c.campaign_name FROM Expenditure e JOIN Campaign c ON e.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE e.amount < 5000 ORDER BY e.amount DESC
SELECT c.campaign_name, SUM(co.amount) AS total_contribution FROM Campaign c LEFT JOIN Contribution co ON c.campaign_id = co.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name HAVING total_contribution > 5000
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions;
SELECT contributor_name, amount FROM campaign_contributions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, date_contributed FROM campaign_contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expenditures_tracking WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY date_contributed DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, amount FROM campaign_contributions WHERE date_contributed BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount_contributed, contributor_name FROM campaign_contributions GROUP BY contributor_name HAVING total_amount_contributed > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM campaigns INNER JOIN candidates ON campaigns.campaign_id = candidates.candidate_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, amount_spent FROM campaigns LEFT JOIN expenditure_tracking ON campaigns.campaign_id = expenditure_tracking.campaign_id ORDER BY amount_spent DESC;
